description: New Bostonians 2012 is the BRA's latest overview of the foreign-born population in Boston. This report provides a demographic and economic snapshot of Boston’s foreign-born population. This recent update contains new data and calculations using the most recent American Community Survey, a yearly survey by the U.S. Census Bureau to allow communities to see how they are changing in the years between decennial censuses.
